A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good looking film. Great action. Ruined the future of Star Wars. If it was not part of Star Wars I would certainly think this would be at least a 4 Star from most sci fi fans but they personally ruined it for me. What story have they left for th next one? I certainly would wait to see reviews before blindly go to watch IX (something iv never done with SW before). Also not enough pansexual transgender Mongolian actors in th film and in this day an age it's a JOKE!
